attributes.action: Block the appointment of Tony Blair as Middle East envoy for the U.S. E.U. Russia and the UN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fact that Tony Blair'e era as British Prime MInister has finally come to an end, unfortunately it has come to my attention that he is being considered as a candidate for the role as an envoy to the Middle East for the UN, US, EU and Russia.  This despite the fact he has brought more violence to the region of the last 5 years than almost anyone else.  And he is completly bias on all issues relating to the region.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
